raw_infobox.name: Kevin Durant
raw_infobox.caption: Durant in 2023
raw_infobox.highlights:
* 2× NBA champion (2017 NBA Finals, 2018 NBA Finals)
* 2× NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award (2017 NBA Finals, 2018 NBA Finals)
* NBA Most Valuable Player (2013)
* 15× List of NBA All-Stars (2010–2019, 2021–2025)
* 2× NBA All-Star Game Most Valuable Player Award (2012, 2019)
* 6× All-NBA Team (2009–2013, 2017)
* 5× All-NBA Team (2015, 2016, 2018, 2021, 2023)
* NBA Rookie of the Year Award (2007)
* NBA All-Rookie First Team (2007)
* 4× List of National Basketball Association annual scoring leaders (2009–2011, 2013)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* List of U.S. men's college basketball national player of the year awards (2006-07 NCAA Division I men's basketball season)
* Consensus first-team NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans (2007 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* USBWA National Freshman of the Year (2007)
* Big 12 Conference Men's Basketball Player of the Year (2007)
* No. 35 Texas Longhorns men's basketball#Retired numbers
* FIBA Men's Olympics Most Valuable Player (Basketball at the 2020 Summer Olympics – Men's tournament)
* FIBA World Cup MVP (2010 FIBA World Championship)
* 3× USA Basketball Male Athlete of the Year (2010, 2016, 2021)
* McDonald's All-American Game Co-MVP (2006 McDonald's All-American Boys Game)
* First-team Parade All-America Boys Basketball Team (2006)
* Second-team ''Parade (magazine)'' All-American (2005)
